author: Aldo Zilli
method: Put the feta and cherry tomatoes into a bowl.  Make a dressing by mixing the olive oil with the garlic in another bowl. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and serve at once.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz feta, cut into 1cm/½in cubes,  10 cherry tomatoes, halved,  small handful rocket,  4 tbsp olive oil,  ½ garlic clove, peeled, crushed,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
